verses.content: Bûkna indik naw chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a nih; Inkhîna indik ruok chu a lâwm zâwng a nih.
Chapona chu a hung pha chun, inzaknain a hung zui; Varna ruok chu inngaitlâwmhai kuomah a um.
Mi tluong chu a lungril indiktak chun ṭhuoi a ta, Bawsetuhai ruok chu an khêl- inhlipnain anni suksieng a tih.
Lungsen nia chun hausakna chu a ṭhahnem chuong nawh a, Felna ruok chun thinaa inthawkin a sansuok.
Mi fel famkim chu a felna chun a lampui kâwkhmûng a ta, Mi khawhlo ruok chu a khawhlonaa ngei chun tlu lem a tih.
Mi tluong chu an felna chun anni sansuok a ta, Ringmawumtaka thawtuhai ruok chu an thil sukpawi ngei chun anni lâng a tih.
Mi khawhlo chu a thi chun, a beiseina chu bohmang a tih, Mi fel naw beiseina chu bohmang bawk a tih.
Mi fel chu buoinaa inthawk san suokin a um a, A hmuna chun mi khawhlo chu a lût hlak.
Pathien ngaisak naw mi chun a bauin a tuolbâwm chu a suksiet a, Mi fel ruok chu hrietna leia sanhim a nih.
Mi fel le ṭhataka a khawsak sûng po, khawpui chu a hlim hlak, Chun, mi khawhlo chu a bohmang pha chun khêkri a um hlak.
Mi tluong malsâwmna leiin khawpui chu chawimawiin a um a, Nisienlakhawm, mi khawhlo baua pei thlâkin a um hlak.
A tuolbâwm ngainêptu chu varna bo a nih, Mi hrietthiemna nei mi ruok chu a to ṭawk ṭawk.
Mi lâwt vêltu anga invâk vêl chun thurûk a phawr hlak a, Mi lungril ringumtak ruok chun thu chu a ip hlak.
Inṭhuoina var um nawnaa chun mi an tlu hlak a, Thurâwntu tamtakhai lai ruok chun himna a um.
Hmêlmak mi ta dinga aiawtu ni chu kawisieng a ta, Aiawtu nina theidatu ruok chu nghet lem a tih.
Nuhmei zângaithei chun inzâumna a kawl zing a, Pasal kâwlhrâwng chun hausaknahai a kawl hlak.
Mi zainêmtak chun a lungril ta ding ngeiin thil ṭha a thawh a, Mi rilo ruok chun ama tisa ngei a sukbuoi.
Mi khawhlo chun hlaw hmusit- umtakhai chu a hlawh a, Felna tutu ruok chun lâwmman indiktak chu a hmuh.
Felnaa ngîr det tlattu chun hringna chu hmûng a ta, Suolna hnawttu chun a thina ding ngeiin a thaw a nih.
Lungrila khêlinhliphai chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum an na, An lampuia fel famkimhai ruok chu a lâwm zâwng an nih.
Mi rilo chu hrem naw ni naw ni, Mi fel thla ruok chu sanhim nîng a tih.
Nuhmei hmêlṭha ngairuotthiemna neilo chu, Vawkpui hnâra rângkachak kutsebi ang a nih.
Mi fel dit zâwng chu thil ṭha chau a nih, Mi rilo beiseina chu lungsenna chau a nih.
Semdar raka pung deu deu si a um a, Mamaw tâwk bâk inro tlata tlasam si a um bawk a.
Mi tiktlai chu sukthâu nîng a ta, Tui buoktu chu, ama ngei khawm tui buokkhum nîng a tih.
Bu inrotu chu miin ṭawngsie inphur an tih, A zawrtu lu chunga ruok chun malsâwmna um lem a tih.
Thil ṭha nguntaka zawngtu chun ditsakna a zawng a nih, Pawitâwkna zawngtu chunga ruok chun pawitâwkna chu tlung a tih.
A hausaknahai ring mi chu tlûng a ta, Mi fel ruok chu hna hring angin inno a tih.
Mi ama in ngei sukbuoitu chun takbo ro hluong a ta, Mi invêt chu lungril var kuoma siehlaw nîng a tih.
Mi fel ra chu hringna thingkûng a na, Lungrilhai latu chu mi var a nih.
Ngai ta, mi fel chu hnuoia hin thung nîng a ta, Mi suol le mi khawhlohai khawm chu thung an va ni nasa awm de!
